channel.title: mags on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in mags on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Maggie
item.description: 10:54 am Saturday 30-3-02 I'm at Maggie's house now, Maggie-sitting her while she packs. She's telling stories about her reaction/breakup/arguments with John surrounding their breakup. I'm so thankful for my much cleaner breakup with Wende than Maggie and John are experiencing. - - - - Later this day I went to KTRU to drop off stuff for Abi, and then um, oh that was the night I went to see Parade with Kristen.
